metadata.subject: Re: URGENT: BuzzFeed News inquiry re allegations of sexual harassment

relationships.description: Former physics professor who left in 2008
Current Foundation Professor and Director of Origins Project
Epstein funded Krauss's Origins Project with $100,000 in 2014
Honorary member of board of directors

analysis.purpose: To respond to BuzzFeed News allegations of sexual harassment and provide detailed rebuttals
analysis.significance: High-profile academic responding to multiple sexual misconduct allegations spanning over a decade

notable_quotes: I do not sexually harass people. If the purpose of your reporting is to somehow argue that Universities and other institutions are lax in dealing with well known individuals like myself, then in fact the situation is quite the opposite.

What makes this particular type of allegation so repugnant is that I get asked for literally thousands of selfies, and when people come up to me they are vulnerable, often shaking, and sometimes overly aggressive.

As a scientist I always judge things on empirical evidence and he always has women ages 19 to 23 around him, but I've never seen anything else, so as a scientist, my presumption is that whatever the problems were I would believe him over other people.
red_flags: Pattern of inappropriate behavior with students and conference attendees
Defense of Jeffrey Epstein despite his conviction for soliciting underage prostitution

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion in this communication - it is a defensive response to allegations

illegal_activity.description: This document contains no first-hand illegal activity - it is a response to allegations and discussion of investigations

details: Media inquiry about sexual harassment allegations
Reference to blog posts and media coverage

public_knowledge.context: Lawrence Krauss was a well-known physicist and public intellectual who faced multiple sexual misconduct allegations that became public in 2018, leading to his resignation from various positions

analysis.summary: Lawrence Krauss responds to BuzzFeed News allegations of sexual harassment spanning 2006-2016, providing detailed rebuttals to six specific incidents while defending his reputation and claiming the allegations are false or distorted. He references university investigations that cleared him and discusses his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, who funded his Origins Project.
